title: Mr.Time : After Glow
developerAddress: 2F, J Studio, 28, Donggyo-ro 25-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03993
description: *This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps. This watch is called 'After Glow'.[Mr.Time Watchface Series]We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.More different designs will be updated constantly.* tap : light
descriptionHTML:
*This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps.

This watch is called 'After Glow'.

[Mr.Time Watchface Series]
We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.
More different designs will be updated constantly.

* tap : light
comments: Why it's not showing on my watch? Is it compatible with wear 2.0?
